title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Camping              Camping        At this time, Valles Caldera does not have any established campgrounds or backcountry camping permits available. Groups may explore the option of applying for a special use permit.   There are additional camping opportunities on the neighboring Bandelier National Monument and Santa Fe National Forest; several of which are less than 15 minutes from the preserve's main entrance.
